name: Maamoun
about: Hi, I'm Maamoun Grissa, I'm from a small village called Ouardanine in Tunisia, I'm 34 years old, for 4 years I work as a Fullstack web developer in many companies and sites. I have developed many websites and web applications and am looking to improve in business development and digitization. my skills are HTML, CSS, Javascript, ReactJs, NextJs, NodeJs, NestJs... and others.
